summary: Autohotkey script that fixes \"up\" and \"down\" arrow button behavior in menus and also adds some kind of page up/page down support in game menus (you can list menu items faster). MustHave for those, who don\'t likes SkyUI or has problems with it (for ex: 1280 x 1024 sreen mode).
descriptionHtml:
This is Autohotkey script that changes\"up\" and \"down\" button behavior in menus and also adds some kind of page up/page down support in game menus. Now you can list menu item much more faster.
MustHave for those, who don\'t likes SkyUI or has problems with it (for ex: 1280 x 1024 screen mode).

[b]With this script you can:[/b]
1) continuously scroll menu items while holding \"up\" or \"down\" button
2) do short scrolls (6 times by default) up or down while pressing \"ShortScroll\" button (see Options section below)
3) do long scrolls (12 times by default) up or down while pressing \"LongScroll\" button (see Options section below)

[b][color=green]Installation:[/color][/b]
1) install autohotkey utility (http://www.autohotkey.com)
2) download this script manually and place it wherever you want

[b][color=green]Usage:[/color][/b]
1) just double click on the script and then start the game.
2) do not forget to stop the script (located in the tray) after playing a game.
[b]
[color=yellow]Buttons:[/color]
1) Insert - short scroll up
2) Delete - short scroll down
3) Home - long scroll up
4) End - long scroll down
[/b]

Options:
Look up  \"OPTIONS\" section in the script and configure it as you wish.
author: MG12
